description: During [Operation Dream Job](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0022), [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) used DOCX files to retrieve a malicious document template/DOTM file.(Citation: ClearSky Lazarus Aug 2020)(Citation: McAfee Lazarus Jul 2020)

external_references.description: Cashman, M. (2020, July 29). Operation North Star Campaign. Retrieved December 20, 2021.
ClearSky Research Team. (2020, August 13). Operation 'Dream Job' Widespread North Korean Espionage Campaign. Retrieved December 20, 2021.
